title: Explaining a specific diet
context: Tell a waiter or host that you are vegan, keto, or gluten-free.

content.bestLine: I'm vegan, can I get a plant-based option?

neutral.text: Do you have any vegan options?
I'm looking for a keto-friendly meal
Can I get a gluten-free menu?
I have dietary restrictions, can you help?
What vegan dishes do you recommend?

informal.text: I'm vegan, got any good options?

Hey, I'm gluten-free, can you help me out?
I'm keto, can I get a modification?
Do you have any gluten-free beers?

formal.text: I would like to inform you that I am a vegan
I am following a ketogenic diet, can you accommodate me?
I have a gluten intolerance, can you provide a suitable option?
